8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Qatadah said:"It was said: 'O Messenger of Allah! What is the case of the one who fasts daily?' He said: 'He did not fast nor break (the fast).'" Or, he said: "He never fasted nor broke (his fast)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَوْمِ الدَّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting Daily
